attributes.action: Reduce the cost of PCR tests required to travel
attributes.additional_details: The additional regulations medical providers in the UK must meet to provide PCR tests suitable for travel have inflated the price of tests in the UK far beyond prices in European countries. This situation must be reconsidered to give UK travellers a fair and confident chance to travel abroad in the coming phases of this pandemic.
attributes.background: Reduce the ridiculously high cost of PCR tests needed to exit and enter the UK to give more people the opportunity and confidence to travel abroad

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575509
